long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Psyduck, a revolutionary platform redefining the landscape of donation in live streaming.

IMPORTANT: Psyduck is not just another live streaming platform, it's a groundbreaking solution designed to transform the way donations are made during live streams.

WARNING: Now the extension is only support for Twitch

Psyduck isn't just a donation platform; it's a comprehensive system aimed at enhancing the donation experience for both streamers and viewers alike.

Out of the box, Psyduck offers a wide range of features to streamline the donation process:

- Seamlessly integrated donation mechanisms
- Advanced analytics to track donation trends
- Customizable donation options for streamers
- Enhanced security measures to protect user data

In addition to its core features, Psyduck empowers users with the ability to customize their donation experience:

- Personalized donation alerts and notifications
- Interactive donation widgets for enhanced engagement
- Social media integration for sharing donation milestones

Psyduck is committed to transparency and accessibility:

- Free to use for both streamers and viewers
- Open-source with a public license (Apache-2.0 license)
- Developed by a community of passionate individuals dedicated to improving the live streaming experience

If you're interested in learning more about Psyduck:

Contributors on GitHub: https://github.com/hollow-leaf/psyduck
